code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoList=_ref=>{let{todos,onToggle,onDelete,onEdit}=_ref;const[editingTodoId,setEditingTodoId]=useState(null);const[editedTask,setEditedTask]=useState('');const[editedDueDate,setEditedDueDate]=useState('');const[editedDueTime,setEditedDueTime]=useState('');const handleEdit=todo=>{setEditingTodoId(todo._id);setEditedTask(todo.task);setEditedDueDate(todo.dueDate.split('T')[0]);setEditedDueTime(todo.dueTime);};const handleSave=async todoId=>{await onEdit(todoId,{task:editedTask,dueDate:editedDueDate,dueTime:editedDueTime});setEditingTodoId(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"todo-list",children:todos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"todo-item",children:editingTodoId===todo._id?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:editedTask,onChange:e=>setEditedTask(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:editedDueDate,onChange:e=>setEditedDueDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"time",value:editedDueTime,onChange:e=>setEditedDueTime(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSave(todo._id),children:"Save"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setEditingTodoId(null),children:"Cancel"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:todo.completed?'completed':'',children:todo.task}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Date: ",new Date(todo.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Time: ",todo.dueTime]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onToggle(todo._id),children:todo.completed?'Undo':'Complete'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleEdit(todo),children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onDelete(todo._id),children:"Delete"})]})},todo._id))});};export default TodoList;
